marklogic.body:
I do not know why so many people here , look at this video and think Zimmerman is innocent. Just because the police knew him , does not make him not guilty. He was aÂ wannabe cop and mostÂ are a bit over the top that I have knownÂ !Â He loved the power!
Â Anyone with a cut on the back of the head that needed stitchesÂ would have been bandaged up , a broken nose would have been visable also. His clothes as witnessesÂ say are the same ones at the scene, are clean , no blood , dirt etc.Â Even at this distance you can see his shirt is Tucked in and is clean.Â SomethingÂ just does not ringÂ true with theÂ Zimmerman account.Â I know we are not suppose to judge , but it isÂ hard not to see, this man is not hurt , he was not beaten up as stated andÂ he stalked and killed that boy in Cold blood.Â This is a police cover up , and he needs to be charged with murder .Â
Â If Trayvon were your son you would want justice , I know I would!
